name: Kid Fish Problem Solver Extraordinaire Episode 1: Lost and Flounder
name_original: Kid Fish Problem Solver Extraordinaire Episode 1: Lost and Flounder
description:
Wake up in a forest. Meet the locals.Solve their problems. Go fishing  and find upgrades.

A chilled and short adventure that can currently be completed in under one hour.

Planning a bunch of fixes and more content in future updates.

Featuring an original chiptune soundtrack by @GenghisHanSolo

The game wouldn't have happened if it wasn't for the gorgeous free tilesets  I butchered by https://ansimuz.itch.io/
